text.text_translated: Many artists sell a lot of albums, but Bruce Springsteen is different. He is almost 70 years old, and he still makes new music. His new songs often go to number one. He plays in very big stadiums, and they are always full. He is still one of the best musicians. This does not surprise me. He tells stories about the most important things in our lives. When you listen to his album 'Born in the USA', you can understand this. Those stories are still true for people's lives today, just like in the past.
